duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and analyze primary and secondary steel components for NSWCPD Land Based Test Site facilities, ensuring compliance with industry codes and standards.
Prepare design deliverable documents and validate detailed calculations, design drawings, and specifications for quality control.
Visit site and/or client offices as required by the project to oversee design and analysis activities.
Interface with Project Director, Project Manager, and design team for project collaboration and coordination.

education_certification.credential: BS or higher degree in Structural Engineering (P.E. License preferred)
